topic.title: Submission Requirements
topic.section: To ensure the submissions to the conference have been properly prepared in content and form for processing, in Step One of submission process, the Author must check off all items in Submission Checklist, set by the Conference Manager in Scheduled Conference Setup Step 2.3, before being allowed to proceed to Step Two. The Author can enter comments in the box to the Director if feels that he/she has more to say for this page, or he/she is unable to comply with one of the requirements for certain reason. The author should also check Copyright Notice to express agreement to the terms, if set by the Conference Manager in Website Management Step 1.4, and to select the most appropriate track for submission.
